doc.title: Harmonics
doc.plot: Harmonics is a visual music piece, which takes viewers through a sensory journey using experiments in light, color and sound. The interplay of the visual with the audial allows the viewer to experience the piece differently each time and demand a heightened state of their senses. Shot on 35mm film, Harmonics is the filmmaker's first project completed analog. The piece exposes the traits of film stock, which cannot be achieved through digital means. It is an experiment using capabilities of light manipulation and how light is captured onto film.
